attributes.action: Do more to prevent homelessness and poverty
attributes.additional_details: Many people are now homeless because of the cost of living, while MPs get pay rises and the government seems intent on wasting the people's money instead of helping us. We need to act now, or people will suffer on the streets.
attributes.background: Due to the cost of living crisis, many more people across the UK have been or will be forced out of their homes. The Government needs to do something to help.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about homelessness, but it's not clear what specific actions you want the Government to take to reduce it.

You could have a petition calling on the Government to do something to support homeless people, so long as it was clear what that was.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: 

Increase funding to house and support the homeless: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614065
